page.title: 19Another school day, Otford.
page.content: I get up at 7.0 am and go downstairs to breakfast. I eat boiled eggs and toast and I drink fresh orange juice. Then I go upstairs and get washed and dressed. My dad drives me to school and I arrive about 8.40 am. In school I line up with the class and go into Assembly. After this I come back to class and get on with my maths, English and other subjects. Towards the end of the day I work on my project. I go out to play at all three playtimes, playing games until the whistle blows. When I get home I flop into a chair and watch the television. After a while I go upstairs and have a quiet read.
